sentences.translation: 毫无疑问，“自然界的懒惰草”依赖着我们。

sentences.sentence: It will feel a bit like the 1970s, when the endless recession and aftermath of the secondary banking crisis in Britain made it a high time for spivs and villains.
sentences.translation: 这有点像19世纪70年代，无止尽的衰退和英国二级银行业危机的余波简直是无业游民和恶棍们的最好时光。
